remarks: A linearly independent family over a nonzero ring has no repeated elements.  (Contributed by Stefan O'Rear, 24-Feb-2015.)
statement:
lindff1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` W ) $.
lindff1.l $e |- L = ( Scalar ` W ) $.
lindff1 $p |- ( ( W e. LMod /\ L e. NzRing /\ F LIndF W ) -> F : dom F -1-1-> B ) $.
